subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A rain delay Sunday curtailed Mike Pelfrey’s outing to only a third of an inning, perhaps a blessing after he allowed singles to the only two Orioles he faced in the Mets’ 5-1 loss.
snippet: A rain delay Sunday curtailed Mike Pelfrey’s outing to only a third of an inning, perhaps a blessing after he allowed singles to the only two Orioles he faced in the Mets’ 5-1 loss.
